summary: This document is an email chain from January 15, 2020, regarding a subpoena rider for UMB Bank concerning Ghislaine Maxwell. An FBI forensic accountant from the New York Field Office is providing the document in response to a request, and a follow-up asks for an update on the subpoena.

persons.name: G. Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena rider is specifically regarding G. Maxwell, indicating she is the target of a financial investigation.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The sender of the email who attached the subpoena rider for UMB Bank regarding G. Maxwell.

connections.person1: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
connections.description: The FBI forensic accountant is involved in the investigation of G. Maxwell, as evidenced by the preparation of a subpoena rider for her bank records.

events.title: Subpoena rider request for UMB Bank
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant sends a subpoena rider for UMB Bank regarding G. Maxwell in response to a request, and a follow-up email asks for an update on the subpoena.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: A subpoena rider was prepared for UMB Bank specifically regarding Ghislaine Maxwell (G. Maxwell).
The document is dated January 15, 2020, indicating ongoing financial investigation into Maxwell around that time.
The correspondence involves an FBI forensic accountant from the New York Field Office, showing federal law enforcement involvement.
The email asks for an 'update on the subpoena,' suggesting it was part of an active investigative process.
